name: Journey to the Thief Dragon
description:
The only hope to save the village is to retrieve the stolen crystal from the dragon. Controls: How to play:
  • Use your abilities to navigate through obstacles until you reach the end.
Tips:
  • On the first level, use the stone to cross, or you can either get lucky or skilled to jump the pond without using the stone.
  • If you got stuck, just use your abilities until you die and restart.
    • Or go to the main menu "Esc" and select the level.
Credits: Nasser Omran - First Programmer
Sawsan Al-Aradi - 3D Artist - Second Programmer
Tariq Amin - Game Designer
